name: The Plaza Hotel
details: The Plaza Hotel is a luxury hotel in Midtown Manhattan, New York City. It is a landmark building and has been featured in many movies and TV shows.

name: The Beverly Hills Hotel
details: The Beverly Hills Hotel, also called the Pink Palace, is a historic luxury hotel located on Sunset Boulevard in Beverly Hills, California.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Chicago
details: The Ritz-Carlton, Chicago is a luxury hotel and a landmark in the city of Chicago, Illinois. It is located in the heart of the Magnificent Mile.

name: The Langham, Chicago
details: The Langham, Chicago is a 5-star luxury hotel in downtown Chicago. It is located in a skyscraper designed by the renowned architect Mies van der Rohe.
